content:
Harrison Mixbus是一个数字音频工作站（DAW），可用于Microsoft Windows、Mac OS X和Linux操作系统，第一版于2009年发布。

 

Mixbus提供了一个现代的DAW模型，结合了 "传统 "的模拟混音工作流程。它包括基于Harrison的32系列和MR系列模拟音乐调音台的内置专有模拟建模处理。

 

Mixbus基于开源DAW Ardour，但由Harrison Audio Consoles进行商业化销售和推广。

 
Mixbus的特点
 
Mixbus提供了Ardour的所有功能，以及来自专有DSP的额外功能，复制了Harrison控制台的工作流程、信号路径和声音。
 
Mixbus的每个通道条都具有模拟建模的3段均衡器（包括一个高通滤波器）、压缩（有3种压缩器类型）、平移和汇总。
 
它还包括8个立体声混合母线，具有音色控制、磁带饱和度、压缩（包括侧链压缩器）。
 
主母线与混合母线类似，但增加了一个限制器，一个用于响度监测的K14表和一个立体声相关表。
 
Mixbus的特点是 "一目了然 "的计量，在每个轨道和总线上都可以看到峰值、峰值保持和压缩器增益降低。
 
Mixbus最初只是一个音频工作站。在早期版本中，它还依赖JACK音频服务器作为其后台。从第3版开始，Mixbus现在同时支持音频和MIDI轨道，它不再依赖JACK，尽管JACK仍可作为其众多音频后端之一。
 
Mixbus32c
2016年，哈里森推出了Mixbus32c。这在很大程度上类似于Mixbus，但升级了EQ部分，带有高低通滤波器，仿照Harrison 32系列调音台，以及包括12个Mixbuses。
 
捆绑的插件
Mixbus还包括基于Xtools插件的捆绑插件，这些插件是Harrison Xrange数字调音台的一部分。这些插件需要用户购买单独的许可证才能使用，尽管它们仍然会处理音频，这使得Mixbus用户可以与其他没有购买许可证的用户共享会话。
 
Mixbus捆绑的插件使用开源的LV2插件格式。
 
它们包括以下内容：
● XT-GV GVerb+
● XT-3D Delay
XT-DM Dyno-Mite
● XT-MG Micro Glide
● XT-BC 低音特性
● XT-VC 声乐特性
XT-DC鼓声特性
● XT-DS 除颤器插件
XT-EG扩展器/门插件
XT-EQ 均衡器
XT-ME 母带均衡器
XT-MC多频段压缩器
● XT-LC看头压缩器
XT-TG汤姆门
XT-SC频谱压缩器
● XT-SP 惊艳相位器
 
第三方插件
Harrison还推广一些第三方的LV2插件，这些插件包含在Mixbus的默认安装中。与Harrison的捆绑插件类似，这些插件需要用户购买单独的许可证。它们包括：
● x42 - 仪表插件包
● x42 - 4段参数均衡器
● x42 - 漩涡
 
控制面支持
Mixbus内置支持：
Mackie
PreSonus FaderPort
PreSonus FaderPort 8
Tascam US2400
开放式声音控制(OSC)
通用MIDI
contentEn:
Developer(s) Harrison Audio Consoles, Ardour contributors
Stable release
6 / April 2020
Operating system Mac OS X 10.4 - 10.6, Linux, Windows (XP Pro or newer)
Type Digital Audio Workstation
Website http://mixbus.harrisonconsoles.com/

Harrison Mixbus is a digital audio workstation (DAW) available for Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X and Linux operating systems and version 1 was released in 2009.

Mixbus provides a modern DAW model incorporating a "traditional" analog mixing workflow. It includes built in proprietary analog modeled processing, based on Harrison's 32-series and MR-series analog music consoles.

Mixbus is based on Ardour, the open source DAW, but is sold and marketed commercially by Harrison Audio Consoles.

 

Features of Mixbus

 
Mixbus mixer window

Mixbus provides all of the features of Ardour, with additional functionality from proprietary DSP, replicating the workflow, signal path and sound of a Harrison console.

Each channel strip in Mixbus features analog modeled 3 band EQ (including a high pass filter), compression (with 3 compressor types), panning, and summing.

It also includes 8 stereo mixbuses featuring tone controls, tape saturation, compression (including a sidechain compressor).

The master bus is similar to the mixbuses but has the additions of a limiter, a K14 meter for loudness monitoring and a stereo correlation meter.

Mixbus features "at-a-glance" metering with peak, peak hold, and compressor gain reduction visible on every track and bus.

Mixbus started out as an audio only workstation. In earlier versions, it also depended on the JACK audio server as its backend. Since version 3, Mixbus now supports both audio and MIDI tracks and it no longer depends on JACK, although JACK can still be used as one of its many audio backends.

Mixbus32c

In 2016, Harrison introduced Mixbus32c. This is largely similar to Mixbus but with upgraded EQ section, with high and low pass filters, which models that of a Harrison 32 series console, as well as including 12 Mixbuses.

Bundled plugins

Mixbus also includes bundled plugins based on Xtools plugins that are part of Harrison Xrange digital consoles. These plugins require users to purchase individual licenses to use them, although they will still process audio which allows Mixbus users to share sessions with other users that have not purchased licenses.

Mixbus bundled plugins use the open source LV2 plugin format.

They include the following:

  • XT-GV GVerb+
  • XT-3D Delay
  • XT-DM Dyno-Mite
  • XT-MG Micro Glide
  • XT-BC Bass Character
  • XT-VC Vocal Character
  • XT-DC Drum Character
  • XT-DS De-Esser Plugin
  • XT-EG Expander/Gate Plugin
  • XT-EQ Equalizer
  • XT-ME Mastering Equalizer
  • XT-MC Multi-Band Compressor
  • XT-LC Lookahead Compressor
  • XT-TG Tom Gate
  • XT-SC Spectral Compressor
  • XT-SP Stunning Phaser

3rd party plugins

Harrison also promotes some third party LV2 plugins, which are included in the default installation of Mixbus. Similar to Harrison's bundled plugins, these require users to purchase individual licenses. They include:

  • x42 - Meter Plugin Bundle
  • x42 - 4 Band Parametric EQ
  • x42 - Whirl

Control surface support

Mixbus has built-in support for:

  • Mackie
  • PreSonus FaderPort
  • PreSonus FaderPort 8
  • Tascam US2400
  • Open Sound Control (OSC)
  • Generic MIDI
remarks:
本词条汉字内容由 @多频百科团队 翻译+编辑
原文译自 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harrison_Mixbus
name: Harrison Mixbus
